Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Itchy \Itch"y\, a. 1. Infected with the itch. --Cowper. [1913 Webster]
2. Having an itching sensation. [1913 Webster]
itchy adj : unable to relax or be still; "a constant fretful stamping of hooves"; "itchy for excitement"; "a restless child" [syn: {fidgety}, {fretful}, {restless}]
